column5: I just checked out the Member Map feature at the top of the page. I noticed that a lot of board members have not added their location to the map. I just added mine. Take a minute to add your location. It is also a great tool to see which board members are in your area.
just added mine.. didnt realize we had a feature like that .. pretty cool
Wow, pretty cool feature. I'm on there!
That's all I need  . More people stopping by to see what's for supper
On there now...never even really noticed it until today.
Don't know what the deal is but it has me about 1000 km East of where it's supposed to be.
This is sweet.. now I know which garages contain the good stuff.
You'll have to go to Timbuktu to find my stuff...

Ok, I added my location a few weeks ago and it came up with a blue pin and when I look at the map today, everybody else has a pinkish coloured pin . my question is did I do something wrong when I added it or does it just mean i'm special? LOL
yer special...lol...  actually i think it defines you from everyone else..
Your pin will be blue.....all others will be red EXCEPT for the people on your friend list....they will be green with letter "F".  At least that's what she said at the Bell Canada picnic....
Now the truth comes out......I thought I had lots of friends on here. Turns out...... I only gots one!
Added.......I am another one of the ignorant that never even noticed it was there!  Great feature!
cool feature i didn't notice also
Keep adding to the map. Let's fill it up.
